text: So a hoax by the environmentalists to hijack the UN IPCC is more believable from a child? Pitiful. Man's activities account for only 10% of the CO2 in the atmosphere or less. The persistence of CO2 in the atmosphere has a half-life of under a decade. CO2 rise has ALWAYS followed temperature rise rather than leading it. The planet has been warming for 250 since the end of the Little Ice Age. Climate Change and its pseudonym AGW are a hoax perpetrated by radical environmentalists who want to shut industry down worldwide. See how well you do with 10% of the energy you now consume heating your home and transporting the food you eat because that's all you will be able to afford if you "go green"

text:
I am 13 years old and I was told that my country won't make it in like 30 years cause of the pollution and that there will be starvation and dehydration. My family and school already recycle, but next to my school is a high school. In that high school nobody recycles and every time I pass by the high school to get to my home, there are 3 containers, AND RIGHT NEXT TO THEM IS LOTS AND LOTS OF TRASH, from plastic to metal. And I feel so sad when I see that. I want to help clean the earth in more ways.

So I have a plan, where I go for summer is in a small town near the sea, but you can see lots of trash near that city, we go there every summer. I decided to take a couple of bags and make a contest with my little cousins who can pick up the trash from the ocean the most, aswell as sort. My cousins are young and like competitions so they'll agree. I will try to get more people with me. I also talked with my family to plant a couple of trees in a forest and they agreed. I'm so happy! I will try my best to keep earth clean

author: Peywend712

text: Greenhouse gases have one job and it isn't to warm the Earth.  The only job of greenhouse gases is to regulate the amount of the sun's energy that is present at the Earth's surface at any given moment.  They do this in three ways.  First, they absorb as much of the energy as they can or as is necessary.  Secondly, they block a portion of the energy from ever reaching the surface.  Lastly, the energy that is reflected off of the planet's surface is reflected back towards the surface.  Well, at least some of it.  Some does escape back into space.  It is well understood that an increase in greenhouse gases will result in less of the reflective energy from escaping and thus be reflected back to the surface, but few seem to realize that it would inevitably block more of the sun's energy from reaching the surface, as well.  The two reactions would, therfor, cancel each other out and result in no effect on temperature

text:
Global Warming started in the 1700s?  Uhhhhhm, the Maunder Minimum lasted into 1710.  The French aristocracy wore animal pelts as undergarments, even shortly before the French Revolution.  George Washington and the Valley Forge disaster happened in 1777.  The Dalton Minimum lasted into the early 1800's.  Napoleon's Army was destroyed by the Winter of 1812.  The Summer that Never Was was in 1816.  The Winters of 1830 & 1836 were record-breaking and vicious.  The Potato Famine was in the 1840s.  There was a Medieval Warming Period, though, from 900 to 1350.  

It's criminal to use children to advance a money-grabbing, a power-grabbing scheme, and the eugenicists dream, in claiming that "extra humans" are destroying the Earth via life-giving CO2.  Plus,  in the Obama years, even 112 BILLION of US taxpayer dollars was shelled out to activists and scientists for climate change "adaptation", for 2014 alone.  Another $10 to $20 billion yearly, for "research."

By the way, the law of Baroclinic Instability and Gradient Forcing is such that higher temps will result in less intense storms, due to the lesser degree of temp difference between the Equator of the Poles.   

And concerning Bill Nye's rant over the "Thermohaline" and Greenland melt:  It's Ekman Transport,  ocean gyre motion, and the Coriolis Effect, along with all high pressure systems' natural affinity to move toward low pressure systems is what moves the oceans.  Moreover, mountain ice, such as Greenland's vaporize, when low pressure is present and sunlight is providing 72 calories of thermal energy per cm3 of ice/snow.

Lots of US taxpayer dollars are involved in the Global Warming Scare.  Thus, those scientists funded as such have a Conflict of Interest and can't be trusted in conveying the truth about climate.  Climategate I proved this to be the case, along with Pausegate, Gleickgate, Glaciergate, etc.  All that the US taxpayer saw was a group of scientists fudging the data and crying wolf, in order to receive grants amounting to a hundred billion+ taxpayer dollars per year.  Next comes the profitable Carbon Credits, Carbon Tax, and an excuse to institutionalize sterilization, abortion, and euthanasia.   If you're going to commit fraud, leave children out of it.

text:
Hello, Rappel, 
My name is Meng Chen, Liu and I come from Taiwan. Currently, I am a student in the teacher education center of National Chiao Tung University (NCTU), and I participant in a competition that aims to design the digital materials for high school students. My topic is climate change and I find a meaning video on your YouTube channel, â€œClimate change (according to a kid)â€ (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sv7OHfpIRfU&t=1s). text:
I find it interesting how we believe that gravity is real, that we have actually seen the planets through far reaching telescopes, that there are atoms and that even smaller particles are within the atom.  We believe these scientists though we ourselves have most likely never  experienced first hand or seen any of these things.  When Gallileo first said that the Earth was not the center of the Universe he was considered a paraiah within the scientific community, yet now we find it laughable that the scientific community of his time fiercely believed he was wrong.  
Bottom line, whether you believe in Global Warming and climate change, or whether you believe that CO2 is the cause or not, does not change the fact that we are polluting our waters, our air and our land causing ecosystems harm.  We cannot deny that our use of plastic, our mining for coal, our extraction of crude oil, and so on, has impacted our Earth in a negative way.  Our use of fossil fuels is not a clean and harmless source of energy by any means. 
Sometimes I think that people can't see the forest for the trees.

text:
The propaganda was fine until it reached 55 seconds and everything after that is environmentalism hogwash. A theory of man made global warming which is not science and has been proved wrong time and time again. All (Over 100+) UN climate models have been wrong against observable data. No average warming for 20 years. The poles have as much ice as 30 years ago, the seas have not risen much in 50 years, storms are not getting stronger and are fewer in number, no more droughts than normal, no more floods than normal. CO2 a trace gas is a plant food and is vital to all life on the planet. More CO2 means a greener planet as plants need less water to grow

Climate Change is a religion based of christian doomsayers from the book of Revelations. ie "Repent the end is nigh" 
Earth has a natural cycle of warming and cooling depending on the heat output of the Sun (Sun spots), precession, solar winds, cloud covering, volcanic activity, The Moons position over the North or Southern hemisphere, Earths gravitational and magnetic forces. Which has effected it for 4.5 billion years. 
Earths warming did not change in 1700 because of man, the earth has naturally been warming since 15000 years with a min-ice age 400 years ago. Sea levels have risen 400 feet in that time and all of it natural.
Finally the Paris Agreement will not attend to any climate change issues. It a social justice method to redistribute wealth from Christian countries (sin tax) and give it to poorer mainly non christian countries. Remember the basis of this religion is all about its man's fault and we must all repent or be doomed. Paris Agreement in a nutshell. However, since when has a sin tax ever altered the climate?

text: Hey kid, the Tooth Fairy isn't real and CO2 is not causing global warming.  Evaporation and rainfall is how heat leaves the surface.  Forget the blanket analogy.  Think of CO2 as oil floating on water.  Add more CO2 (oil) and the "cap" is thicker.  But then put it in a blender and the cap is meaningless.  That's how it works.  More CO2 just means greener plants.  Also, "normal" doesn't make sense as we swing back and forth between ice ages.

author: Alex Tristan

text:
I agree with the video up to 55 seconds and then everything after that is based on a theory that has been debunked of CO2 being the driver of climate change. The truth is CO2 is a consequence to warming lagging behind and following the trend of warming and cooling. Man's contribution to this 0.04% trace gas is 4%. An ant farting in a stadium has more effect.

"not a single scinetific institution on this planet rejects AGW".  Have a little guess who pays their checks every month and how many would be out of a job if they say AGW is not the cause.
Should you be listening to scientists that adjust their data to fit a debunked theory?

This is real climate science that has not been manipulated by NASA, NOAA and East Anglia University.
http://hockeyschtick.blogspot.com/2013/06/climatologist-dr-john-christy-climate.html
author: Simon John

text:
+TheMrSirCharles. The 97% of all scientists was a fraudulent poll conducted by 2 Australian "scientists" who sent out thousands of questionaire to many scientists, many of which were not climate scientists, in which 2 questions were related to "global warming" and if any of them thought man was responsible. only about 55 of them answered the questions to which these scientists discarded the other 4940 questionaires. The questionaire did not suggest any danger or to what degree any warming was down to man.
The actual consensus was at the time 0.3%, but since this narrative was created, if you want a career or funding for your climate research, the money is on proving AGW, and no money on natural climate change. So given a choice as a scientist which would you support if you have to pay your mortgage, support your family? Thus we find a consensus in scientists with bills to pay, egos to protect and careers and pensions to support.
author: Simon John
